RustyMagazine.NAME: Rusty Magazine
RustyMagazine.FLAVOR: Rusty magazine for your Rusty Handgun.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you eneter a combat, #yUpgrade ALL #yRusty #yHandguns in your deck.

RumBottle.NAME: Rum Bottle
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, gain #b1 #yConcentrated and lose #b8 #yPrecision.

ScaleOfInjustice.NAME: Scales Of Injustice
ScaleOfInjustice.FLAVOR: As if world wasn't unfair enough.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, gain 1 energy. At the end of each turn, deal #b6 damage to the creature with lowest #yHP. (Including you)

TrustyMagazine.NAME: Trusty Magazine
TrustyMagazine.FLAVOR: Trusty magazine for your Trusty Handgun.

InfiniteLighter.NAME: Infinite Lighter
InfiniteLighter.FLAVOR: It's flame can't be put out.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply #yBurning, apply an additional #b1 #yBurning.

LighterOrb.NAME: Lighter Orb
LighterOrb.FLAVOR: It's not that dark nor heavy.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #yEvoke an #bOrb, apply #b1 #yBurning to ALL enemies.

PoisonLighter.NAME: Poison Lighter
PoisonLighter.FLAVOR: Who would have thought Poison is flammable.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply #yPoison, apply #b1 #yBurning to ALL enemies.

HellfireLighter.NAME: Hellfire Lighter
HellfireLighter.FLAVOR: It's flame grows with your strength.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply #yVulnerable or gain #yStrength, apply #b1 #yBurning to ALL enemies.

RustyHelmet.NAME: Rusty Helmet
RustyHelmet.FLAVOR: It brings back memories, but how did it get here?
